articles.author: Casey Smith
articles.title: Backlash intensifies after Indiana Senate kills Trump’s mid-decade congressional redistricting push - Indiana Capital Chronicle
articles.description: A day after the Indiana Senate rejected a mid-decade redistricting proposal, warnings of political and financial retaliation escalated.
articles.content:
by Casey Smith, Indiana Capital ChronicleDecember 12, 2025
A day after the Indiana Senate rejected President Donald Trumps contentious mid-decade redistricting proposal, warnings of political and fi… [+7431 chars]
